ygData.subject: Re: Illusions - Observations, needs conformation
ygData.msgSnippet: to play on that even....how about sum illusion spells that would temporarily turn you into those fighter, rogues, wizard types........illusion spell that would
ygData.messageBody:
to play on that even....how about sum illusion spells that would temporarily
turn you into those fighter, rogues, wizard types........illusion spell that
would put a sword and shield in youre hands......and cover you in full
plate......if you fought in it it wouldnt help you but at first appearance
you would look increidbly formidable.....I think that would be a GREAT spell
to have......twould definatly be alot of fun........or maybe a spell that
would turn you into a bard......you would be able to play 3 mystic songs of
illusion so that it LOOKED like you were playing a song and it LOOKED like
it is having an effect but it wouldnt.......that would be VERY
COOL>!!!!.....Im going to do a feedbak tonite.......this was a VERY good
idea bro!!!!



Neurosiz

PS....if you like this idea do a feedback tonite........
